features.name: Walk mode
features.desciption: Walk mode allows you to navigate through the model at a slower pace, giving you time to appreciate the scenery and details.

features.name: Camera points
features.desciption: Allow to save camera points that allow to navigate throught saved places faster (eg: kitchen, living room, etc.).

features.name: Virtual tour
features.desciption: Virtual tour allows you to take a guided tour through the model, with a points that Camera Saved.

features.name: Toggle between 2D and 3D
features.desciption: Toggle between 2D and 3D allows you to switch between a 2D floor plan view and a 3D model view, giving you different perspectives of the space.
